info.name: E-Commerce Assistant - Complete Challenge & Demo Collection
info.description:
Test collection for the E-Commerce Assistant microservices architecture.

**System Architecture:**
- Chat Service (8001): AI orchestration via OpenAI Agents SDK with MCP tool integration
- Order Service (8002): Business analytics for 51k+ orders with enhanced mock API capabilities
- Product Service (8003): RAG implementation using ChromaDB for semantic search across ~5k products

**Key Components:**
- Model Context Protocol (MCP) for standardized LLM tool integration
- Server-Sent Events (SSE) for real-time streaming responses
- FastAPI-MCP for zero-config tool publication
- Production safety features including dataset limits and field exclusion

**Test Coverage:**
- All 10 challenge requirement scenarios
- Multi-tool orchestration demonstrations
- Business intelligence endpoints
- Edge case handling and resilience
- Performance benchmarks

Environment files provided for both local development and Render deployment.

item.description:
Complex 3-turn conversation demonstrating:

- Information gathering
- Session state preservation
- Context retention across multiple turns
    

**NOTE**: If context is lost between turns, verify that session_id is being properly stored and passed.

Tests 10 scenarios from the challenge requirements. This section proves complete fulfillment of:

- 5 Product Dataset Queries
- 5 Order Dataset Queries
- Microservices Architecture
- RAG Implementation
- Mock API Integration (plus enhancements)

request.description: Advanced analytics endpoint showing orders with high profit margins. Demonstrates business intelligence beyond basic CRUD.
Sophisticated demographic analysis showing profit distribution by customer gender. Enterprise-level business intelligence.
Comprehensive customer analytics including lifetime value, purchase patterns, and preferences. Shows depth of business intelligence capabilities.

item.description: Advanced business intelligence endpoints that go beyond basic order lookup. Demonstrates enterprise-grade analytics capabilities.

item.name: Production Safety Features

exec: console.log('âœ… 51k+ dataset handled safely without overwhelming LLM');

request.description: Tests production safety feature: automatic capping at 1000 records to prevent LLM overwhelm from 51k+ order dataset.

exec: // Check the first order in the items array

item.description:
Production-ready safety features including dataset size limits and LLM field exclusion patterns.

- Prevents returning \~51k order dataset
- Excludes database UUIDs in _order_id_ field.

Demonstrates enhanced order service capabilities:

- Business Intelligence Analytics
- Customer Lifetime Value
- Demographic Analysis
- Production Safety Features

item.name: Metadata Discovery

request.description: Discovers available brands/stores in the product catalog. Enables dynamic filter generation for UI.
Discovers product categories for dynamic navigation and filtering.

item.description:
Metadata discovery endpoints to afford LLM global view of data landscape. This allows the LLM to more appropriately design semantic search requests, configure filters and impose constraints.

Also useful if user wants quick breakdown of what's available in the database.

Enhanced product service demonstrating:

- RAG with ChromaDB (\~5k products)
    
- Semantic search with natural language
- Complex filtering and sorting
- Token optimization through Pydantic model field exclusion (exclude=True)
    
- Metadata discovery for dynamic UIs
